articles.author: Odishatv Bureau
articles.title: Bhubaneswar '6th hottest place in Asia' as heat wave sweeps Odisha - OTV News
articles.description: Bhubaneswar was the sixth hottest place in Asia on Friday (April 05, 2024), informed IMD Bhubaneswar Scientist, Umashankar Das.
articles.content:
Bhubaneswar was the sixth hottest place in Asia on Friday (April 05, 2024), informed IMD Bhubaneswar Scientist, Umashankar Das. 
Das took to his X handle and shared a list of Asia's 10 hottest place… [+802 chars]
